1. WARNING: NEVER CHANGE THE [[main.manu]] blog TO OTHER THINGS IN 'config.toml'

2. Make a banner image (1000*750 px), put it into static/img/banners/

3. Run blogdown::serve_site() in RStudio

4. Change 'Blogs' to 'Posts' in public/blog/xxx/index.html. xxx is the name of the post

5. Upload 'index.html', 'index.xml', 'sitemap.xml', 'blog/xxx/index'
